name: Mini Golf Buddies
description: Challenging 3D mini golf simulator with colorful isometric graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space
